name: Laser Lab (itch)
description:
Laser Lab is a fun puzzle game where your goal is to direct lasers into their receivers.

Easy, right? Wrong! You have to deal with combining and separating colors, different power levels, and limited mirrors. While we, the developers, know each puzzle is possible, neither of us has ever beaten all of them without a cheat sheet.

Good luck and have fun working your way through the puzzles!
